results.t: Cost of Living in Japan. Prices in Japan. Updated Sep 2024
results.p: A family of four estimated monthly costs are 3,212.1$ (457,164.3¥) without rent. · A single person estimated monthly costs are 910.7$ (129,620.6¥) without rent.

results.t: Living Abroad In Japan: Cost Of Living And Visas - Pacific Prime
results.p: Jul 6, 2024 — The nationwide average monthly rent, not including utilities, for a one room apartment (20-40 square meters) is between 50,000 and 70,000 yen.
